original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, posts as p WHERE pl.PostId = p.Id AND c.PostId = p.Id AND v.PostId = p.Id AND ph.PostId = p.Id AND c.Score=0 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-11-21 22:39:41' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-01 16:29:56' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-22 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-14 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2011-11-21 22:39:41' AND CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-01 16:29:56'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2.PostId=E5.Id)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-22 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-14 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2E5.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E5E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E5E4.PostId=E3.PostId)
